a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Plastic waste generation by region and polymer, 2019
Polymer types are as follows: Acrylonitrile Butadiene (AB), Acrylonitrile Styrene Acrylate (ASA), Styrene
Acrylonitrile (SAN), Polyurethane (PUR), Polyvinyl Chloride (PVC), Polystyrene (PS), Linear Low-Density
Polyethylene (LLDPE), Polypropylene (PP), Polyethylene Terephthalate (PET), High-Density Polyethylene
Note: Regional aggregates were calculated by Our World in Data and are based on those specified by the OECD.
